sn48.70:1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci supaṇṇānaṃ rukkhā, kūṭasimbalī tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
sn48.70:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāya.
sn48.70:1.4: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati …pe… paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
sn48.70:1.5: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci supaṇṇānaṃ rukkhā, kūṭasimbalī tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
sn48.70:1.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāyā”ti.
